snippet.title: SteamWorld Heist II | Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Attention, steam-mates! SteamWorld Heist II is OUT NOW! 🤖

Join Captain Leeway and his ragtag crew of steambots as they embark on the heist of a lifetime! Assemble your ultimate crew, battle your way through tactical shootouts filled with ricochet action, and solve the mysterious water crisis plaguing the Great Sea Shard in this epic turn-based strategy adventure!

Out now on PC, Switch, Playstation, and Xbox!
https://steamworldgames.com/steamworld-heist-2 

---------------------------------------------------------------------- 

Want to stay up to date on all the latest SteamWorld news? Join our community! 
https://discord.gg/nEeY98emwN 
https://twitter.com/SteamWorldGames 
https://www.instagram.com/steamworldgames/ 
https://www.facebook.com/steamworldgames/ 
https://www.tiktok.com/@steamworldgames
